110100 + 10101 = 0 01001001 ( 52 + 21 = 73 ) 
1 - 11110000 = 1 00010001 ( 1 - 240 = -239 ) 
11111111 + 11111111 = 0 11111110 ( 255 + 255 = 510 ) (* Overflow)
11111111 - 11111111 = 0 00000000 ( 255 - 255 = 0 ) 
1 + 1 = 0 00000010 ( 1 + 1 = 2 ) 
11111110 + 00000001 = 0 11111111 ( 254 + 1 = 255 ) 
11111111 + 00000001 = 0 00000000 ( 255 + 1 = 256 ) (* Overflow)
00000000 - 00000001 = 1 11111111 ( 0 - 1 = -1 )
